thread.title: BRIEF-Roy Ceramics Says Signed Contract For Investment In Project Development In Jurupa Valley

title: BRIEF-Roy Ceramics Says Signed Contract For Investment In Project Development In Jurupa Valley

organizations.name: brief-roy ceramics says signed contract for investm
project development in jurupa valley reuters

text:
April 6, 2018 / 7:21 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Roy Ceramics Says Signed Contract For Investment In Project Development In Jurupa Valley Reuters Staff 
April 6 (Reuters) - ROY Ceramics SE: 
* SIGNED A CONTRACT FOR AN INVESTMENT IN A PROJECT DEVELOPMENT IN JURUPA VALLEY 
* SAYS ‍ OVERALL PROJECT COSTS ARE ESTIMATED TO BE AROUND USD 61.8 MILLION​ 
* SAYS ‍ ROY WILL PARTICIPATE IN THIS PROJECT AS A MAJORITY SHAREHOLDER WITH USD 5 MILLION.​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
